channel.title: socket.io on Katas
channel.description: Recent content in socket.io on Katas

item.title: React Express Socketio
item.description: Requirements: Create a React application and run it to get default page Remove all extant files Create a new App.js starter file Add socket-io to server.js Add socket-io-client to App component Send ‘Welcome!’ message on client connect Render ‘Welcome!’ message from the server Tech: nodejs npm npx react (create-react-app) socket.io (socker-io) socket.io-client (https://www.npmjs.com/package/socket.io-client) References
